attributes.action: Support reforestation of Scotland in government's Draft Climate Change Plan
attributes.background: The Scottish government have drafted a plan to implement measures to counter climate-change (http://www.gov.scot/Publications/2017/01/2768), which includes measures to plant trees. We the undersigned support the proposal.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
